channel.title: Migration on Rob Sewell (aka SQL DBA With A Beard)
channel.description: Recent content in Migration on Rob Sewell (aka SQL DBA With A Beard)

item.title: The first page with GitHub Pages
item.description:
Last night I started the experiment that has been in my head for a while now, to move from SQL Dba With A Beard to RobSewell.com

Thank you Chrissy Blog Twitter for the push!

I followed the instructions from her blog post Migrating my WordPress sites to GitHub Pages but chose to use the Minimal Mistakes theme

I like the search at the top and the 404 page :-)

Now I need to export the wordpress from SQLDbaWithABeard.com (Its currently running)

item.title: SQL Express Migration Auto Close Setting
item.description:
With over 700 databases to look after at MyWork automation is high on my list of priorities. I have two PowerShell scripts which run regularly checking SQL Error logs. One checks for the output from DBCC CHECKDB and one for errors. They then email the results to the DBA team.

This week we noticed that a new database was creating a lot of entries. It appeared to be starting up every few minutes. A bit of investigation by my colleague revealed that this database had been created on SQL Express and migrated to SQL Server.
